patthana13.22:1.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_2: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_3: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_4: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:1.1_5: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.22:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana13.22:3.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighañca anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana13.22:5.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_2: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_3: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca naanidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_4: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca naanidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:5.1_5: Anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca naanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.22:6.1_0: Sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
